African Paralympic Committee (APC) ma ọ bụ African Sports Confederation of physical challenged persons (ASCOD) bụ nzukọ dị na Luanda, Angola
Ndị otu ya n'Afrịka bụ Kọmitii iri anọ na asatọ nke National Paralympic.
Na tebụl na-esonụ, a na-enyekwa afọ nke Kọmitii Paralympic International (IPC) nabatara NPC ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị iche na afọ e kere NPC.
Àtụ:Regional Organizations of National Paralympic CommitteesÀtụ:Sports governing bodies in Africa
